College_Summary: Thakur Shivkumarsingh Memorial Engineering College (TSEC), Burhanpur is a private engineering college established in the year 2011. It is affiliated to the Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya and approved by AICTE. The college offers full-time Bachelor of Engineering programs in five disciplines that include Electrical, Civil, Mechanical, Computer Science and Electronics & Communication. Admission to the courses is granted on the basis of JEE Mains scores. The college consists of highly-qualified faculty in every department and has excellent academic facilities to enhance the learning process.

The college accepts admission through entrance only. Shri Rawatpura Sarkar Institute of Technology issues numerous facilities such as hostel, bank facility, gym, etc to their students.

Admission to AFMR is conducted through a counseling process based on C-MAT score. It awards scholarships to the deserving students.

College_Name: Acropolis Institute of Management Studies & Research - [AIMSR], Indore

Furthermore, the institute has an Industry Institute Partnership Cell which helps the students in training through industry interactions and gain practical experience. The highest package offered is INR 6 LPA and the average package offered is INR 3.2 LPA. Some of the potential recruiters are Amazon, Wipro, Federal Bank, HDFC Bank, Bajaj Finserv, Reliance Jio, etc. Check: AIMSR Indore Placement

College_Name: Bansal Group of Institutes, Bhopal
College_Summary: Bansal Group of Institutes (BGI), Bhopal is one of the leading education group of Central India, in the field of Technical Education. Established in 2000, the institute is affiliated to RGPV, Bhopal and Barkatullah University and approved by AICTE. It offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programs in various disciplines like Engineering, Management, Pharmacy and Computer Applications. Admission to BGI Bhopal is done on the basis of CAT/JEE Main/GATE scores. Additionally, The institute provides an environment conducive for harnessing the potential of both faculty and students through systematic and effective planning and control of the teaching-learning process, both within and outside the classroom. The basic teaching-learning process is supplemented by organizing tech fests, cultural programs, sports competitions, industry-institute meets, guest lectures by renowned personalities. The placement cell of BGI has placed 9500+ students so far in 200+ various companies of different sectors in core technical engineering and other domains. The highest package recorded at INR 16.5 LPA. BGI has an impressive placement record with top recruiters like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, HCL, Cognizant, Capgemini, etc. Check: BGI Bhopal Placement

College_Name: Bansal College of Pharmacy, Bhopal

This pharmacy college got its approval from the Pharmacy Council of India (PCI) and All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). Bansal College of Pharmacy is officially affiliated to the Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya. This college offers Pharmaceutical education to the students through the aid of numerous advanced techniques. The total area of the college campus is spread across 5 acres.

The institute offers B.Tech courses under Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering and Mechanical Engineering specializations at the undergraduate level. Admission to BIRTS Bhopal is done on the basis of JEE Main scores. The institute brings to the students an integrative learning model based on the industry needs of skilled professionals. College_Name: Dr. Harisingh Gour University (DHSGSU)
College_Summary: Dr. Harisingh Gour Vishwavidyalaya, popularly known as Dr. Harisingh Gour University (DHSGSU) is a central university located in Madhya Pradesh. Formerly known as the University of Saugar, Saugor or Sagar University, DHSGSU is the oldest and biggest university in Madhya Pradesh that was established in the year 1946. Dr. Harisingh Gour University is recognized by the UGC and accredited with an ‘A+’ grade by the NAAC.

College_Name: Jiwaji University
College_Summary: Jiwaji University is a public university located in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh. It is recognised by the UGC and AICTE. Jiwaji University has been accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. It has been ranked 86-90 among all the Indian universities by QS World Ranking. Jiwaji University started with 29 affiliated colleges and now has more than 400 colleges affiliated with it. Check Jiwaji University Affiliated Colleges

College_Name: LNIPE Gwalior
College_Summary: Lakshmibai National Institute of Physical Education (LNIPE) was established in August 1957 in memory of Rani Lakshmibai of Jhansi by the Ministry of Education and Culture, Government of India. It is a deemed university under the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports. The institute promotes excellence in sports and physical education with its vast range of courses under UG, PG, PGDM, and Ph.D. categories.

College_Name: NDVSU Jabalpur
College_Summary: Nanaji Deshmukh Veterinary Science University established in 2009 is affiliated to UGC and located in Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh. The university offers different courses in Fisheries, Veterinary, and Allied sciences. The University has three Veterinary colleges at Mhow, Rewa, and Jabalpur. It offers Undergraduate courses such as Bachelor of Veterinary Sciences and Animal Husbandry - B.V.Sc & A.H and Bachelor of Fisheries Sciences - B.F.Sc, Diploma course in Animal Husbandry, Doctoral and PG courses. The university also offers various orientation and training programs.

MMYVV is the only university in India, to offer courses based on Vedic sciences and related technologies. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral level programs such as B.Com, BCA, M.Com, Bachelor’s in Vedics, Ph.D. and many more that are affiliated to National Council of Technical Education. Students are provided with the theoretical knowledge followed by training programs, during the tenure of these courses. Admission to these courses is based on merit received in past academics.

College_Name: Maharshi Panini Sanskrit Evam Vedic Vishwavidyalaya, Ujjain
College_Summary: Taking into consideration of holiness of Ujjain City, Maharshi Panini Sanskrit Evam Vedic Vishwavidyalaya was formed in order work for protecting, preserving and propagating the Sanskrit language and its literature. It is established in the year 2008. Campus is spread over 25 acres of land in Ujjain City. University offers well tailored Undergraduate, Postgraduate and research programme in various disciplines of vedic sanskrit . The University offers a multitude of affiliations for many prominent Vedic Colleges like Sanskrit Mahavidyalay, Purushottam Sanskrit Mahavidyalaya and Narayan Sanskrit Mahavidyalaya- just to name a few. University is recognized by the University Grant Commission of India.

College_Name: MGCGV Satna
College_Summary: Mahatma Gandhi Chitrakoot Gramoday Vishwavidyalaya (MGCGV), Madhya Pradesh, was established in 1991. It is a state university and has been accredited with A grade by NAAC. The University offers undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma, and vocational courses across varied disciplines like Arts, Engineering, Agriculture, Science, and Rural Development & Business Management. The campus is well equipped with all the required facilities and uses technologies such as smart classes for teaching.

College_Name: MCU Bhopal
College_Summary: Makhanlal Chaturvedi National University was established in the year 1990 and is located in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. The University was given its name after Pandit Makhanlal Chaturvedi, the great editor, poet, litterateur and freedom fighter in his era.

College_Name: RGPV
College_Summary: Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV) is a state university situated in Bhopal, India. The university is recognized by the UGC and accredited with an "A" Grade by the NAAC. RGPV is formerly known as the State Technological University of Madhya Pradesh with a campus sprawling over 247-acres. At present, the university is offering UG, PG, Diploma/Polytechnic, and Research level across 400+ RGPV affiliated colleges and institutions. It has 5 UTD's, 200 affiliated Engineering colleges, 98 pharmacy colleges, 95 MCA colleges, 4 Architecture Colleges, and 85 polytechnic institutions.

College_Name: RDVV Jabalpur
College_Summary: Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya is a government university which was established in 1957 at Jabalpur. It is also known as the University of Jabalpur which has been accredited by NAAC with ‘B+’ grade. ​It offers various UG and PG courses in the departments of Arts, Science, Commerce, Medicine & Management. These courses are offered in University Teaching Departments (UTD) and affiliated colleges under the scheme of Choice Based Credit System (CBCS).

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 4 Reviews

College_Name: Vikram University
College_Summary: Vikram University, founded in 1957, is situated in Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh. The university is UGC and BCI approved and accredited with a grade of "A" by the NAAC. With more than 1,50,000 students enrolled, Vikram University has 171 associated colleges, 11 faculties, and 28 schools of study. Vikram University (VU) has well-versed experienced faculty members. Apart from regular courses, the college offers PG Diploma and certification courses in several specializations.

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 2 Reviews

College_Name: Oriental Group of Institutes - [OGI], Bhopal
College_Summary: The Oriental Group of Institutes is a collective of technical and nontechnical colleges that function under the Oriental group.  Since 25 years of standing, competent faculty, exquisite infrastructure, outstanding RGPV results, and state of the art facilities, has carved a niche for itself in the field of Technical Education. Its’ major courses at OIST, are accredited by the National Board of Accreditation, New Delhi. The Group was founded by the Chancellor of Oriental University in the year 1995. With a fully disciplined ambiance, the Oriental Group happens to be the preferred choice of students during admissions.

College_Name: Oriental College of Management (MBA)- [OCM], Bhopal
College_Summary: Oriental College of Management is among the most preferred Business schools in terms of excellence. It functions under the aegis of Oriental Group of Institutes which is spread over a lush green campus of 15 acres within the city of Bhopal. The college provides students with a highly qualified faculty as well as state of the art infrastructure and world-class facilities. It attracts meritorious graduates from various Universities of India.

College_Name: People's College Of Paramedical Science and Research Centre - [PCPS], Bhopal
Government Girls College, Katni
Directorate of Distance Education, Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya - [DDE DAVV], Indore
Barkatullah University Distance Education
College_Summary: Institute of Open and Distance Education, Barkatullah Vishwavidyalaya was set up under the name of the Department of Correspondence Courses in 1975. The university was accredited ‘B’ grade by NAAC (National Assessment and Accreditation Council) in 2015. The institution takes pride in its ability to provide a large number of courses at the Graduate and the Post-graduate levels. Although the institution provides courses on a large variety of streams, it is especially well known for its courses on MA and PG Diploma.

College_Name: Shri Vaishnav Institute of Law - [SVIL], Indore
College_Summary: Established in 2005, Shri Vaishnav Institute of Law is one of the institutions run by ‘Shri Vaishnav Vidyapeeth’ trust. The institute is located in Indore, Madhya Pradesh and has been granted recognition by the Bar Council of India. The institute is affiliated to Devi Ahilya Vishvavidyalaya, Indore.

College_Summary: Institute of Management Studies, Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya (IMS DAVV) is a premier institute of Business Management under the aegis of the University of Indore as the Management education wing of the university. IMS DAVV offers a Master’s of Business Administration (MBA) to students with 6 specializations.

College_Name: Dr A.P.J. Abdul Kalam University
College_Summary: Dr A.P.J. Abdul Kalam University Indore was established in 2016. The University is recognised by UGC and approved by AICTE. The University offers UG, PG, Diploma and PhD programmes in numerous specializations. Admission to all the courses is based on Merit as well as Entrance Exam.
